page.title: 11LEISURE IN BUCKLAND BREWER
page.content:
THIRTEEN DIFFERENT{ARTS}AND {CREATIVE CRAFTS}WERE REFERRED TO BY THE PEOPLE IN THE SURVEY OF LEISURE ACTIVITIES AND MORE THAN ONE-THIRD OF ALL WHO WERE INTERVIEWED HAD AT LEAST ONE SUCH ACTIVITY AS A HOBBY.
{KNITTING}WAS THE MOST POPULAR OF THE ART AND CRAFT ACTIVITIES, WHICH FOURTEEN PERCENT OF THOSE INTERVIEWED PREFERRED. NEXT IN ORDER OF POPULARITY WERE{SEWING, DRESS-MAKING}AND {PAINTING,}WHICH WERE THE CHOICES OF BETWEEN THREE AND SIX PERCENT. OTHER HOBBIES INCLUDED WERE{PHOTOGRAPHY {CROCHET,MACRAME,SPINNING, MODEL- {MAKING, WOODWORK, SHOE-MAKING, STONE- {CAST}AND{DRAWING.
